00013 namespace mprace {
00014 
00015 class Pin;
00016 
00030 class RegisterPin : public Pin {
00031 public:
00036         RegisterPin(unsigned int *reg) { 
00037                 this->reg = reg; 
00038         };
00039 
00044         virtual ~RegisterPin();
00045 
00051         virtual void set(bool value) { *(this->reg) = (value) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : 0x0; }
00052 
00058         virtual bool get() { return (*(this->reg) != 0x0); }
00059         
00064         inline void set() { this->set( true ); }
00065 
00070         inline void clear() { this->set( false ); }
00071 
00072 protected:
00073         /* Avoid copy constructor, and copy assignment operator */
00074 
00078         RegisterPin(const RegisterPin&) {};
00079 
00083         RegisterPin& operator=(const RegisterPin&) { return *this; };
00084 
00085 private:
00086         unsigned int *reg;
00087         
00088 }; /* class RegisterPin */
00089 
00090 } /* namespace mprace */
